Hermione sat down in her seat to watch the Muggle movie, but something didn't feel right. There was an annoying itch on her bum. Were this her house, or even her hotel room, she would have flipped up her skirt and plunged her hand down into her panties, but this was an airplane, and there was someone sitting next to her. It would perhaps be...disconcerting, not only for the person next to her, but also for her parents. So Hermione placated the itch by reaching down to her skirt and raking the fabric with her fingers. She attempted to eliminate it, but it just seemed to move with her fingers. Just as she thought she had it pinned and sent down her scything fingers, it shifted again.

Then Hermione had a wicked thought; she began to herd the "itch" towards her crack, and when it was sufficiently close, she threw herself back in the chair. Now the irritating itch was stuck in her buttcrack, where it stopped bothering her, and she could focus on the movie. Vaguely, she wondered whatever had become of the tiny American she had shrunken. Odds were the Magical Congress of the United States of America would have gotten involved almost immediately. The jerk would have had a Memory Curse put on him, he would be regrown and then he would continue his life as usual. MACUSA wouldn't be able to punish her; not only was she not a citizen, but she was underage, and with no formal magical training whatsoever. The worst that could happen would be a stern warning from her own Ministry. The only possible problem would be if he were somehow transported across the ocean with her, at which point she could be arrested. But it was probably nothing to worry about...

Unbeknownst to her, she was right. She wouldn't be arrested, and indeed couldn't, because the Magical Congress was entirely unaware that such an event had taken place. Nobody would watch the security footage, and there were no public records indicating Miss Hermione Jean Granger was a witch. And while the disappearance of a Muggle (or, in American terminology, no-maj) might be the subject of a minor police investigation, there would be no one to suspect sorcery. For all intents and purposes, the tiny human now stuck between the mountainous buns of Hermione Granger was a legal non-entity. Speaking of which...

Hermione began to wonder as to the nature of the "itch" she had felt earlier. Since the plane had long since taken off, she unbuckled her seat belt and stood up, so she could go to the bathroom to check on it...

Choice One: You fall out of her panties and into her shoe. Hermione remains unaware, but now you must deal with her sweaty, confined, dirty-sock-clad feet

Choice Two: Hermione goes to the bathroom and finds you. However, she may think you're a pervert, and subject you to cruel and unusual punishment...

143212.title: Toilet Discovery

choices: Go For The OTHER Bag, You Pansy!
1432121.content:
The girl whipped out her wand and pointed it at you, mumbling a few spells. Seemingly satisfied, she smirked at you. "That should keep you from drowning. Let's find out, don't we?"

With that, she dangled you over the toilet...and let go. You screwed your eyes shut as you plummeted, expecting the water to hit you in the face with the force of a small locomotive. But even though the water enveloped you, there was an invisible pocket of breathable air surrounding your head. You broke the surface of the water, still breathing normally. Above you, the titanic 11-year-old girl stared at you and grinned. "So the Bubble-Head Charm did work. Fascinating."

But down below, you were still worrying about your punishment. You cried up to her, "Wait, is this all you're going to do to me?"

The giantess giggled. "No, silly. Your punishment is just beginning."

With that, she turned and lifted her skirt, revealing her still-bare bum, as her panties were still around her ankles. Suddenly, the dots connected for you, but it was too late; your captor sat down on the toilet, sealing you in darkness. Even your desperate, defiant cry of "NO!", though echoed by the now-closed container, failed to reach outside the bowl.

Then the young witch started to unload. First came the roaring sound of more liquid streaming from the inner depths of her body. Though it was dark, and so you could not see the billowing yellow cloud as it boiled through the water, you could still feel the hot urine seep through your clothing, could feel the immense sea rise ever so slightly, could feel the ceaseless ripples which radiated from the center of a ghastly yellow waterfall somewhere and front of you and which threatened to send you across the ocean. Then the giantess shifted her position ever so slightly, and the seemingly-endless flow of her piss was concentrated on you. As you were hit by this natural hose, two things occurred. The most obvious was that you were forced under the now-contaminated water. The second was that droplets from the stream ricocheted off you and hit the exposed flesh of Hermione's bum.

Hermione shivered a little at this unexpected and disgusting experience. Perhaps at this point, as she shifted back to avoid any further nasty wastes getting on her person, she felt a twinge of guilt, of pity for this poor man who she had not only shrunk but was now relieving herself upon. But a sharp pain in her rear immediately dispelled all thoughts of remorse. She hardened her heart and resolved to see it through to the invariably messy end. After all, she told herself, he was a pervert for getting in her panties, and already rude, but...no. No buts, except for her own enormous one. This, this jerk would soon learn to fear the name of Hermione Granger.

Meanwhile, you had finally resurfaced, and Hermione's endless waterfall had finally petered out. Now there was only silence, and the sound of you treading "water". Then you heard the girl above you groan. She released nothing solid, but a noise and a scent. PRFFFFFFFFRRRT! The witch farted, and farted again, filling the bowl with her stench. The constant smacking of her cheeks was mixed in with her straining with...something. And at that moment, she scooted towards the front of the toilet. A shaft of light reached down into the now-yellow waters, and there, silhouetted against the new light, was a humongous turd! You were given only enough time to recognize it before a large chunk of it broke off and splashed down into the toilet, once again submerging you -- and you were once again saved by the Charm the witch had laid on you. You came to rest right where there was a bend in the bowl, where it became a pipe -- out of sight of the witch.

Hermione continued to excrete into the bowl, then wiped her arse with some of the cheap airplane toilet paper and threw that in as a finishing touch. Finally, she stood up and looked at her handiwork. She realized the tiny pervert was nowhere to be found! And worse, the soon-to-be student didn't know his name, and she had forgotten how to do the Summoning Charm, so if she searched, it would have to be...manually. Hermione broke off her stare. There was no way, no way she would do that. So she settled for a parting shot.

"You know," came down the bossy voice, slightly garbled by the volume of waste matter between you and the girl, "I really think you're more trouble than you're worth. If you've escaped, good for you. If not, well...this is 'goodbye' anyway. If you ever see anyone ever again, tell them Hermione Granger did this to you."

Then came the roar of the vacuum as the toilet was flushed and you were cast into oblivion.

Hermione pulled up her panties, smoothed her skirt, and flounced out of the bathroom and back to her plane seat to watch her movie in peace. Little did either she or you know how airplane toilets work. There is a common myth that airliners just dump their waste mid-flight. In fact, waste is merely sent to waste containers in the stern of the plane. There, it will be mixed with a blue, corrosive disinfectant, and then those containers will be taken off when the plane lands. However, leaks can occur. When that happens, the mixture is splashed on the outside of the plane, where it freezes into what is called 'blue ice'. Interestingly, the waste tanks are right next to the luggage compartment in most planes...

You were stuck in the tanks. It was dark. The disinfectant burned like hell. And throughout all of this, the charm cast on you by the young Hermione Granger stayed strong. Then, through the burning blue, you saw light. Not thinking clearly, you swam towards, as your protective charm began to falter. But when you reached the light, instead of the safety of the inside of an airplane, you saw only the cold sky and the gleaming metal of the outer hull. You were splattered onto an already-existing layer of blue ice. You had to scramble along the open hull to avoid being frozen. In about thirty minutes of this frigid, thin air, your body would be overwhelmed and you would suffocate. And if you lost your grip, you would plummet thousands of feet into the uncaring Atlantic Ocean. But where could you be safe? Where?

Just then, you saw a slight crack in the metal surface of the plane. Hot(ter) air was escaping from some crack in a compartment. Muscles burning, you scrambled up the icy panels and slid down into the inside of the room. It was dark, but you could handle that. In front of you were rows and rows of luggage. As you walked around and on top of the suitcases, purses, and bags in an effort to get as far away as possible from the possibility of falling out of the plane, two partially-unzipped things in the very back of the storage compartment caught your eye. One was very familiar indeed -- the red suitcase of the Grangers, and of Hermione. Given what she had just done to you, you could be forgiven for not springing for that option. Still, better the devil you know... The second piece of luggage was a small black duffel bag. By getting closer to it, you could see it was stuffed with a whole mess of dirty clothes -- mostly underwear and stockings. The bag had a silver-green ouroboros (a snake eating its own tail) around the initials 'PP'.

The immaturity of the initials, or maybe just the recent stress caused by something pronounced as those initials, made you laugh hysterically. But you still had a choice to make. The devil you know, or the one you don't?

Choice One: You choose the Granger's bag, only this time you are determined to go for as long as possible without alerting the young witch Hermione to your presence, though if she did notice you, she's probably take a kinder approach.

Choice Two: You risk the black bag. Unfortunately, Hermione isn't the only witch headed home for Hogwarts this summer, and this one might take a more 'proactive' approach to your presence...

1432121221.title: Hermione opens her bag and sees Kyle

1433.content:
You decide the best course of action would be to sleep in the sock. It was, after all, like a giant sleeping bag. You burrowed in to the cave of soft white fibers and fell asleep. Had you known what would come, you might have preferred to spend the night in your envelope.

***

Hermione Granger was not one to lose things, or forget about things, or fail to plan for things. But she found herself needing a pair of socks. Perhaps it was the fact that she had worn sandals for much of the summer. Or perhaps it had been the shrinking of the Muggle yesterday, or perhaps the mysterious envelope she had received last night. Either way, she was now holding up her somewhat-impatient family.

She walked over to the suitcase and unzipped it. There! A pair of white socks! Hermione grabbed them and fumbled with them, inevitably getting first one, then the other, caught on her feet. Immediately, they felt too hot -- maybe there was time to pull them off and...Her father cleared his throat and tapped his watch. No. There was no time.

Miss Granger slammed the suitcase shut and crammed her sock-clad feet into her brown shoes before running off, suitcase rolling behind her.

***

You had just woken up when you heard the rumbling of the zipper. When you heard the top of the suitcase flip open, you tried to exit the sock to see what was going on. But before you could go much further than the toe section, the opening at the end of the tunnel, where the light came from, was pinched shut by a hand, and you were plunged into darkness. A millisecond later, you and the sock were weightless, suspended out in space by some giant.

Then the end was reopened, and you saw a familiar face.

It was the girl who shrank you. Somehow, impossibly, the eleven-year-old girl who shrank you was now hosting you in her sock. The security officer must have seen her and decided you belonged to her. But did this girl -- this witch -- even know you were there? That the capricious desires of Fate had deposited you, once again, at her mercy?

Then the girl stuffed her feet into the sock, answering your question sufficiently.

Her skin was a mixture of tan and reddish-pink, but those were not the only colors on her feet. Her yellow-white toenails scythed through the air as her five behemoth toes wiggled for purchase. The pads of her toes had a thin layer of dirt, so the whorls and arches, instead of being covered, were thrown into sharp relief. And her feet stank horribly, you realized, gagging at the putrid scent.

But the witch continued to wiggle and shift her feet into the sock, and you were soon entombed under the ball of her foot as she got her sock on. It was hot, smelly, and dirty. Then, to top it all off, as you desperately tried to hold up her foot, you noticed transparent beads of water -- sweat droplets forming from the heat. As the first salty sweat drop landed on you, the girl slammed foot into the ground and started squirming her foot from side to side -- she was putting her shoes on, and inadvertently giving you a mouthful of foot. Eventually, you stopped being mashed into the odorous, dirty flesh as your enormous captor finished putting her feet into her shoes and stood up. Once again, there was a brief sensation of weightlessness as the foot lifted itself up, up, up into the air. You heard, garbled by the layers but still barely distinguishable, a voice say, "Coming, Hermione?"

The young, magical giantess's voice was only slightly muffled as she responded. "Coming!" Hermione, you thought. Could be a worse name. Then her shoe came down and all was pain.

***

Hermione ran excitedly to the airport. She was finally going back home! Though her feet were sweltering, and there was probably a pebble in one of her socks, nothing stopped her from practically sprinting down the polished tile floors. As the witch-to-be flew past a security guard, the guard turned and noted her brown shoes clapping against the floor. That girl might have almost missed her flight, the guard thought. Thank goodness American security doesn't make her stop and take off her shoes. Perhaps a little more than a decade later, he would be proven wrong.

As Hermione and her family waited in line as the crowd filed into the plane, she felt the pebble in her sock more acutely. So she tapped her toe on the ground, then the heel, then the toe again. The nuisance didn't entirely disappear, but it was good enough for now. Hermione promptly went into the plane, sat down at a window seat, and watched the Muggles as they worked to direct the massive plane. She felt a twinge of guilt for the person she shrank, and then ran away from. She was a Muggle-born, for Pete's sake! How would she if she were shrunken down by a mysterious girl? Then Hermione's thoughts turned to the midnight mail. Could she have accidentally endangered the entire Wizarding World? Was the envelope actually an official response to her actions? Oh dear...

As the young girl fretted, the pebble in her shoe became, insofar as pebbles can become anything, more insistent...

***

Now the horror of Hermione's run was over, you stirred again. You didn't feel the oppressive pressure of the young girl's feet. You could still smell the foot-stench, but that may have been nothing but an after-scent of sorts. Finally, you opened your eyes and saw...

***

Choice One: Hermione's Toes -- You were in the toe section of the shoe. Hermione, though unaware of precisely what she is playing with, will toy with you between her smelly digits.

Choice Two: Hermione's Arch -- Stuck between her ball and her heel, you will have the least amount of wiggle-room. However, Miss Granger will ignore you, so you may wish to plan your escape.

Choice Three: Hermione's Hand -- Finally deciding to look at the tiny trouble spot, Hermione will grab you and bring you to her face to inspect you. Be warned, however; she may not see you as a Muggle deserving mercy, and may seek to torture you (or "the bug/toy", if you so desire) while being very careful not to arouse suspicion in her fellow passengers.

14331.content:
As the passengers of the plane bustle around with their luggage, the Granger family finds a row of seats and settles in. Hermionie's feet were really beginning to heat u in the thick white socks, a development that you were made painfully aware of as her strides bounced you around her dirty sole and the warming fabric threads imprisoning you in the hot brown shoe.

You slowly gather your wits about you after the tumultuous ride to the plane inside the young witch's sock, feeling relieved that the chaos was over.

But your relief was short lived.

As your eyes pan upwards in the dim light from the tiny holes in the girl's sock, filtering through the sweltering air of the loafer. The sight that greeted you nearly made you scream - Hemione's monolithic toes were silhouetted in the dim light, innumerable ridges thrown into deep contrast by the light. They reared above you like fleshy towers, several ridges glistening with fresh perspiration from being trapped inside the hot brown loafers. a film of grime was visible as light reflected off newly dripping beads of sweat, surely unnoticeable to the regular sized inspector, but all too visible to you. As the little witch nervously fidgeted above you, her rank toes came down like a crashing tidal wave of smelly foot.

The fleshy behemoth of her big toe came on one side, the dirty flesh of her second toe on the other. Before you lay a glistening pit of lint and dirt, the soft crevice between the girl's two largest toes. And then, they clasped around you, shoving your face into the moist skin, crushing the air out of your lungs with soft but massive flesh. The calloused ridge of her big toe dug into your skin as bits of grime and beads of sweat covered you. Your nose burned as the hot stale reek of girl feet was pressed into your face. The digits started to contract rhythmically, massaging you into the skin on all sides, relieving some of the little witch's tension at your unknown predicament.

If she only knew you were trapped inside her smelly socks, the uncomfortable heat rising and rising as her sweating soles heated up the loafer like the world's worst smelling sauna. The toenails rasped against the fabric as her toes worked you deeper into the hot darkness like a puppy with a chew toy.

"Something wrong, Hermione?" Her mother asks, concerned.

The toes close like a vice, trapping you in a fleshy cocoon that gets slick with nervous sweat. You scream and get a mouthful of foot flesh.

"N-no mother!" Hermione stammers. "J-just a nervous flyer, that's all."

Trying to do his best to maintain calm, he decided to climb one of these books, titled "Basic Catholic Morals for Young Girls" and, standing on top of it, he was able to look out of the shopping bag and get a better look at his surrounding environment.

He noticed a group of young teenage girls following this nun, all of them using the same uniform, with their name and the initials SCCC in all of them. These were obviously girls of the Saint Claire Catholic School, one of the most distinguished girls-only catholics schools in the city. They were all pretty properly arranged, with no make-up of any sort, and with hair scrunchies. However, he was impressed to see a lot of these girls were incredibly hot and with really sexy bodies. Kyle couldn't help but feel slightly aroused just fantasizing about the possibility of being dominated by them.

After he finished daydreaming, however, he started to ponder on the consequences of his current position. Somehow, he had been shrunk and could be in serious danger if he doesn't get any help. Nevertheless, getting out of the shopping bag seems a bit too dangerous - if the fall doesn't kill him, the feet of these girls following the nun probably would. So, that was out of the question. Now, all he needed to decide was whether to shout and wave for help now, hoping one of the girls closest to the nun sees him, or just wait until they arrive at school, where maybe he could be easily spotted once they open the bag.

15221.content:
Kyle makes it into the room. He looks around and sees a bed, a desk and other furniture. He sees some pony posters on the walls and some bunny slippers under the bed. He knows he is in one of the dorm rooms. As he looks around then he hears someone walking into the room. He scampers under the desk and hides from sight. He hears the door close and lock and sees a Skinny, blond girl with big blue eyes walk past his hiding place and sit on the bed. She is pretty except for the lonely frown on her face. "She doesn't look to happy." He thinks to himself. She has a long bird like face with a small chin, and her blond hair hangs down around her face. He watches her as she starts to kick off her black loafers. They land with a loud thud not to far away from where he is hidden. A musty, cheesy smell wafts over him. He quickly covers his mouth and nose with his hands. He wants to back away, but he is still so curious about the giant world he is in now that he can't. He watches the girl some more. She picks up a book and starts paging through it. He watches as she starts scissor kicking her legs and then flexing her long skinny feet and wiggling her long toes. Her black knee socks sticking to her sweaty feet. He thinks that if she were to accidentally step on him that would be the end. He wonders if he should get her attention or try and keep hiding from her.

info.description:
copied:

Hermione Granger and her parents take a trip to America the summer before she starts Hogwarts. She shrinks a guy named Kyle and decides to keep him or not. This is a resubmit of a story that use to be listed here. Hermione can do magic away from school without getting into trouble. She can do anything to Kyle who is about 20. He can't grow back he must stay smaller than 1 foot and no smaller then 1 centimeter. I like 4 inches tall but am not married to it. Please try to add more than one or two sentences. Other females are allowed, but no males. (I'm not enforcing this) Other than that anything goes. Please use spell checking. Be creative and have fun.
